医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
不仅仅是地中海：探索和承认多元化文化和营养遗产的好处非洲、亚洲和拉丁美洲社区遵循的传统饮食如何与饮食质量和健康相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/More-than-Mediterranean-Exploring-and-acknowledging-the-benefits-of-diverse-culture-and-nutritional-heritages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/More-than-Mediterranean-Exploring-and-acknowledging-the-benefits-of-diverse-culture-and-nutritional-heritages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffab838e-ba9d-4712-9cb2-4280a04bacfb Mon, 15 Apr 2024 05:38:00 -0400 More than Mediterranean: Exploring and acknowledging the benefits of diverse cultural and nutritional heritages
迷幻药可以改善性功能和满意度吗？迷幻药对性功能的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Can-psychedelics-improve- Sex-functioning-and-satisfaction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Can-psychedelics-improve- Sex-functioning-and-satisfaction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90b07989-75c1-4c06-8d3d-58020d3f984e Mon, 15 Apr 2024 04:54:00 -0400 Can psychedelics improve sexual functioning and satisfaction?
运动可抑制糖尿病和糖尿病前期患者的食欲研究探讨了运动如何影响 2 型糖尿病或糖尿病前期患者的食欲，发现急性运动通常会抑制食欲，而长期运动通常会维持或降低食欲，而不会产生不良影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Exercise-shown-to-curb-appetite-in-diabetes-and-prediabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Exercise-shown-to-curb-appetite-in-diabetes-and-prediabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00a39b1a-5936-4be1-bc45-2d5a2fe170d3 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 01:19:00 -0400 Exercise shown to curb appetite in diabetes and prediabetes patients
新研究揭示母乳对抗 RSV 的秘密武器研究人员探索了母乳低聚糖 (HMO) 如何保护婴儿免受呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 感染，表明母乳中的这些成分可以通过肠道微生物组调节和直接抗病毒作用等多种机制来预防或减轻 RSV 感染的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Breast-milks-secret-weapon-against-RSV-revealed-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Breast-milks-secret-weapon-against-RSV-revealed-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a66b69d6-ac99-4e61-8697-699a6e9eeb91 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 00:54:00 -0400 Breast milk's secret weapon against RSV revealed in new study
二十年的数据证实地中海饮食可降低高血压风险一项历时 20 年的研究表明，坚持地中海饮食可以显着降低最初没有高血压的成年人的高血压发病率，这强调了这种饮食在控制血压方面的长期益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Two-decades-of-data-confirm-Mediterranean-diet-cuts-hypertension-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Two-decades-of-data-confirm-Mediterranean-diet-cuts-hypertension-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91c7313a-9362-424c-a195-db2099f65dfa Mon, 15 Apr 2024 00:37:00 -0400 Two decades of data confirm Mediterranean diet cuts hypertension risk
研究揭开了 APOEε4 携带者的遗传秘密，可预防阿尔茨海默病研究人员利用全基因组测序和通路分析发现了 APOEε4 携带者中针对阿尔茨海默病的保护性遗传变异，揭示了细胞外基质相关基因在减缓疾病进展中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-unlocks-genic-secrets-in-APOEceb54-carriers-that-c​​ould-defend-against-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-unlocks-genic-secrets-in-APOEceb54-carriers-that-c​​ould-defend-against-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5057cbe8-5539-41d9-9ca6-98480474dffa Mon, 15 Apr 2024 00:23:00 -0400 Study unlocks genetic secrets in APOEε4 carriers that could defend against Alzheimer's
研究揭示了 SARS-CoV-2 如何劫持肺细胞导致 COVID-19 严重程度研究人员确定了 SARS-CoV-2 如何瞄准和操纵特定的肺细胞，利用创新技术追踪病毒对细胞基因表达的影响，揭示了对早期 COVID-19 发病机制的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Study-reveals-how-SARS-CoV-2-hijacks-lung-cells-to-drive-COVID-19-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Study-reveals-how-SARS-CoV-2-hijacks-lung-cells-to-drive-COVID-19-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6db0e23-120b-4a30-a227-427d6f2b5f1f Sun, 14 Apr 2024 23:29:00 -0400 Study reveals how SARS-CoV-2 hijacks lung cells to drive COVID-19 severity
产后服用艾氯胺酮可将产后抑郁症的风险降低四分之三产后服用低剂量艾氯胺酮可在 42 天内显着减轻产前抑郁症女性的抑郁症状，尽管短暂的神经精神副作用有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Esketamine-after-childbirth-cuts-risk-of-postnatal-depression-by-third-quarters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Esketamine-after-childbirth-cuts-risk-of-postnatal-depression-by-third-quarters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1dc89c72-d7e1-43df-9ee5-4486e571c3af Sun, 14 Apr 2024 23:14:00 -0400 Esketamine after childbirth cuts risk of postnatal depression by three-quarters
研究发现睡眠策略可以提高超级马拉松成绩研究调查了睡眠管理在提高超级马拉松运动员的表现和恢复方面的作用，强调了抵消睡眠不足的负面影响的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Sleep-strategies-may-boost-ultramarathon-performance-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Sleep-strategies-may-boost-ultramarathon-performance-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=522fcfcc-e43f-473d-a96d-38addf012621 Sun, 14 Apr 2024 21:18:00 -0400 Sleep strategies may boost ultramarathon performance, study finds
母亲的体重会影响母乳喂养的成功吗？研究回顾了文献，探讨了母亲体型对母乳喂养成功的影响，检查了不同体型母亲的泌乳时间、乳汁量和婴儿消耗量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Does-maternal-weight-influence-breastfeeding-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Does-maternal-weight-influence-breastfeeding-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3da8209a-e550-44ab-97ba-1fba39f277f1 Sun, 14 Apr 2024 21:00:00 -0400 Does maternal weight influence breastfeeding success?
